item.title: About
item.description: 俺たちは正義せいぎという名の復讐ふくしゅうへと駆かり立たてられた普通ふつうの人間だ｡ だが復讐を正義というならばその正義は更さらなる復讐を生うみ憎にくしみの連鎖れんさが始はじまる｡ ペイン We are but men, drawn to act in the name of revenge that we deem to be justice. But if there is justice in revenge then that same justice will breed only more revenge and trigger a cycle of hatred. Pain Contact me Tweet @iamsorashi Email Telegram @sorashi Discord: sorashi#1829 ko-fi (coffee donation ☕🤤) keybase My PGP fingerprint 0x1267B02C81C3B2689A1EF9AF2B6997C991199960 You can import it from a public pool or keybase.
